name: Term Duplicator
author: CGD Inc.

sections.description:
Sometimes you need to duplicate a category or tag (or custom taxonomy term) in WordPress, and up until now there wasn’t really an easy way to do this. This plugin adds a “Duplicate” link in the actions under a term on its respective view. That’s it.

Support

If you need support, use: Contact CGD

Hire Me

If you need a WordPress developer, I’m available for hire: Contact CGD

Version History

Version 1.0.0

  • Iniital version.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the directory “term-duplicator” to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Look for new “Duplicate” link under terms on category, tag, or custom taxonomy view.

short_description: WordPress Term Duplicator allows you to copy or duplicate WordPress categories, tags, or taxonomy terms.
